title: Checks on Legislative and Judicial Branches

content.description:
Legislative checks to the judicial branch
 Judicial checks to the legislative branch

A
 Impeaching and removing federal judges
 Declaring an entire law unconstitutional

B
 Confirming federal judges
 Reviewing laws prior to enactment

C
 Appointing federal judges
 Striking down a portion of a law

D
 Establishing the number of Supreme Court justices
 Removing the Speaker of the House
content.question: Which of the following is an accurate comparison of the checks held by the legislative and judicial branches?

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
